# Load libraries and functions

```{r}
# load libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(ggridges)
library(cowplot)
library(bio3d)
library(penm)
library(jefuns)


# source functions
source("enm_plot.R")
```


# Set up parameters

```{r}
param <- lst(
  enm = lst(model = "ming_wall",
            d_max = 10.5,
            frustrated = TRUE)
)

str(param)

```


# Read and perform ENM NMA of wild-type protein


## Initiate wild-type wt object

```{r}
## read wt coordinates
pdb_file <- "data/2acy_A.pdb"
pdb <- read.pdb(pdb_file)

# set network nodes
wt <- prot_sc(pdb) #note I could use prot_ca or prot_sc here

str(wt)

```


## Initialize wild-type

Check that it works when pdb_active_site is defined
```{r}

# check that it works with active_site defined
dummy_active_site = wt$pdb_site[5:7]
wt <- init_prot(prot = wt,  
                pdb_site_active = dummy_active_site, 
                ideal = wt, # ideal to calculate v_stress and dv_active
                model = param$enm$model, d_max = param$enm$d_max, frustrated = F)
                
str(wt)
```

Check that it works when pdb_active_site is NOT defined
```{r}
# set up wild-type
wt <- prot_sc(pdb)
# check that it works with active_site defined
wt <- init_prot(prot = wt,
                ideal = wt, # ideal to calculate v_stress and dv_active
                model = param$enm$model, d_max = param$enm$d_max, frustrated = F)
                
str(wt)
```


## Plot and compare msf


```{r}
plot_msf_site(wt, d_max = param$enm$d_max)
```

## Plot normal-mode matrix

```{r}
plot_umat2(wt)
```

## Plot a few normal modes
  
```{r}
nmodes <- max(wt$enm$mode)
plot_modes(wt, plot_modes = c(1, 2, 3, 4, nmodes - 3, nmodes - 2, nmodes - 1, nmodes))
```
